item.title: Mentioned by StarPhoenix
item.description:
Questions arise
Federal Court Judge Richard Mosley ruling last week on the robocalls/vote suppression case included my riding of Saskatoon-Rosetown-Biggar, represented by Conservative MP Kelly Block. Even though the judge said there was no evidence to directly link ...

item.title: Mentioned by traders (press release)
item.description:
WESTERN ECONOMIC DIVERSIFICATION CANADA : Harper Government ... - 4
Today, Kelly Block, Member of Parliament for Saskatoon-Rosetown-Biggar, on behalf of the Honourable Lynne Yelich, Minister of State for Western Economic Diversification, announced support for upgrades to the Perdue arena under the Harper Government's Community Infrastructure Improvement Fund (CIIF). "Our Government is pleased to support infrastructure projects across the country, like upgrades to the Perdue arena's roof," said MP Block. "The Community Infrastructure Improvement Fund will benefit ...
